info.title: MaPS Retrieved Pension Records
info.description: This service allows a client to retrieve retrieved pension records related to a user session

get.description: Get the retrieved retrieved-pensions-records that contains pensions information has been retrieved from the PDP Ecosystem for peis.

parameters.name: userSessionId
parameters.description: The id of the user session that the retrieved pension record is associated with.

parameters.name: mhpdCorrelationId
parameters.description: An Id with which to group all logging statements made during a single session

200.description: The array of Retrieved Peis that match the provided query parameters

get.description: Get the retrieved retrieved-pensions-records that contains pensions information has been retrieved from the PDP Ecosystem for peis.

parameters.name: userSessionId
parameters.description: The id of the user session that the retrieved pension record is associated with.

parameters.name: mhpdCorrelationId
parameters.description: An Id with which to group all logging statements made during a single session

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Gets a subset of the pensions retrieval records that have the specified classification.

parameters.name: assetId
parameters.description: Gets a specific pensions retrieval record with the specified Id.

200.description: The array of Retrieved Pension Records that match the provided query parameters

delete.description: Deletes the given pension retrieved record id.

parameters.name: userSessionId
parameters.description: The id of the user session that the retrieved pension record is associated with.

parameters.name: mhpdCorrelationId
parameters.description: An Id with which to group all logging statements made during a single session

200.description: The number of records deleted as part of the request
